I don't wanna wait too long to tell you
Just wanna be, there through the times… Of your life

I lose my breath when you walk by
I don't wanna wait too long to tell you
Just wanna be, Just wanna be
I've been in love with you for so long
I lose my breath when you walk by
I don't wanna wait too long to tell you
Just wanna be, there through the times…
(Just wanna be, there through the times)
Of your life.

name: A Beautiful Mess
lyrics: You've got the best of both worlds
